title: Lease Transfer - 01June2022 through 06Sept2022
description:
Hi guys,
Looking to transfer my lease for a one bedroom & one bathroom apartment in Center City, Philadelphia, from 1st June 2022 through 6th Sept2022, little over 3 months. Again, this is lease transfer not subleasing. So you take over the lease for the remaining period 1st June 2022 through 6th Sept2022 and I am out of the lease agreement. Since, the apartment management will be holding the deposit of $500 till the end of the lease period, the new lease signer have to pay the outgoing tenant (that's me!) $500, directly. You will get back your deposit from the apartment management after the completion of your lease period based on the terms and agreement of lease. The apartment is in great condition, as I keep it clean, non-smoker, no pets and hardly cook. So basically, you will get an apartment like a new unfurnished one, short term at a very reasonable rate compared to rent on similar apartment in this area.

title: Large Artist's loft with gated parking
description:
Large, Attractive New York-style loft with gated parking available for rent. This sunny 1400 sq foot unit with a lofted bedroom area is located on the first floor of a small creative community building in Port Richmond in the Riverwards section of Philadelphia. Easy access to 95 and public transportation, and walking distance to Reanimator coffee shop, Her Daughters café, and Nemi Restaurant and Bar.
The unit has two entrances, one accessed directly from the street, and the other from the community garage area. The unit boasts 14 ft ceilings, 8 ft tall windows, and hardwood floors. The modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a built-in microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and refrigerator with an ice maker. In addition, the unit includes central air and heating, a washer and dryer with a utility sink, a ceiling fan, and recessed lighting. One wall has exposed brick with sliding walls that could be used as an artist's work surface.
The new tenant is responsible for the first, last, and one-month deposit to secure a one-year lease, plus a $40 application fee.
Water and sewage included. Tenant pays electric and gas.

title: Delightful 3 bed/ 2 bath in Newtown PA
description:
Delightful 3 bedroom 2 bath home in Newtown, Bucks County, with family pool membership included.
Enjoy, easy access to Philadelphia and Princeton metro areas.  Single two story home with an oversized family room and gas fireplace, gourmet eat-in kitchen and professional quality gas oven.  Upscaled with a custom.
Large dinning / living rooms, covered patio, large laundry room, central air.  Large fenced yard opens to wooded common grounds and walking trails to Tyler State Park 2 car garage, with remote opener
Council Rock Schools.   A great family friendly community of single homes, swimming pool, tennis, basketball, playground, community center, and much more.  Adjacent to Tyler State Park.  Enjoy all you have been looking for
Available spring 2022- rent is based on long term agreement plus utilities. Shorter terms also available. Possible option to own.
Conveniently located near: Philadelphia, Trenton, and Princeton.  Major employers include, Merrill Lynch, Bristol Myers, Johnson and Johnson, St. Mary's Medical Center, Princeton University.  Newtown is 40 minutes to the Phila. Airport, 10 minutes to mall, 5 minutes to train. Convenient to major commuting routes, and walking distance to Tyler State Park offering hiking, biking, fishing and canoeing.
